class HiDT[source]

HiDT(data:DataBunch, content_encoder:Module, style_encoder:Module, decoder:Module, discriminator:Module, gen_loss_func:Callable[Tensor, Tensor, OneEltTensor], crit_loss_func:Callable[Tensor, Tensor, OneEltTensor], n_crit=None, n_gen=None, switcher:Callback=None, gen_first:bool=False, switch_eval:bool=True, show_img:bool=True, clip:float=None, **learn_kwargs) :: Learner

A gan learner to train a HiDT model

{% endraw %}

Model

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HiDTModule[source]

HiDTModule(content_encoder=None, style_encoder=None, decoder=None, discriminator=None, gen_mode:bool=True) :: Module

Wrapper around a generator and a critic to create a GAN.

{% endraw %}

Callbacks

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HiDTTrainer[source]

HiDTTrainer(learn:Learner, switch_eval:bool=False, clip:float=None, beta:float=0.98, gen_first:bool=False, show_img:bool=True) :: LearnerCallback

Handles GAN Training.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FixedGANSwitcher[source]

FixedGANSwitcher(learn:Learner, n_crit=5, n_gen=1) :: LearnerCallback

Switcher to do n_crit iterations of the critic then n_gen iterations of the generator.
